short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Boost your productivity! Easily focus on a web page while temporarily blocking distractions.

ğ——ğ—²ğ˜€ğ—°ğ—¿ğ—¶ğ—½ğ˜ğ—¶ğ—¼ğ—»:
Having issues with procrastination or staying on a specific webpage for a concentrated amount of time? Don't worry because Focus-Pocus will prevent you from accessing any new or old tabs to help you stay well... Focused! Whether you really need to read a document, watch a video, or do your homework, Focus-Pocus will enhance your experience with a couple simple button clicks and you'll be all set! Say goodbye to any distractions. 

ğ—›ğ—¼ğ˜„ ğ˜ğ—¼ ğ˜‚ğ˜€ğ—² ğ—¶ğ˜:
âŠ Click the "Save URL" button on the web page you want to focus on
â‹ Click the "Turn On/Off" button when you have a URL saved
... and that's it :D
